tourBios.curYrHigh: Played in 21 Web.com Tour tournaments, making 10 cuts. Had four top 25s, with best finish a T11 at the Chile Classic in March. Finished T19 at both The Rex Hospital Open in May and Air Capital Classic in June. Finished 99th on the money list.

tourBios.exmtStatus: Conditional - Additional Qualifying Tournament Finisher or Finished 76-100 on 2015 Web.com Tour Money List
tourBios.curYearHigh: Played in 21 Web.com Tour tournaments, making 10 cuts. Had four top 25s, with best finish a T11 at the Chile Classic in March. Finished T19 at both The Rex Hospital Open in May and Air Capital Classic in June. Finished 99th on the money list.
tourBios.carHigh: 2014: Finished T50 at Web.com Tour Qualifying Tournament in December...Played 16 events on PGA Tour Latinoamerica and posted seven top-10s. Recorded a pair of runner-up performances, at the Mundo Maya Open and the Arturo Calle Colombian Classic, where he fired a 64 in the third round. Ended the season No. 4 on the Order of Merit.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the Web.com Tour was T11th in 2015 at the Chile Classic.
